name: vs-code-joomla-snippets
description: Snippets for Joomla. Including Joomla 3.x and Joomla 4 Snippets.

scripts.build: npm run build_snippets; npm run build_readme; npm run dups; npm run countPHP
scripts.publish: npm version patch; vsce publish; git push
scripts.install: npm run build; vsce package; code --install-extension *.vsix
scripts.build_readme: cat src/README_top.md > README.md; npm run generate_readme_table; cat src/README_bottom.md >> README.md;
scripts.generate_readme_table: cat src/snippets.json | grep 'prefix\|description' | sed -e "s/description//" | sed -e "s/prefix//" | sed -e 's/    "": "//' | sed -e 's/",//' | sed -e 'N;s/\n/ | /' | sed -e 's/$/ |/g' | sed -e 's/^/| /' | sort  >> README.md
scripts.dups: npm run dup_snippet; npm run dup_name
